com.gcu.business

Interface MusicBusinessInterface<T,S>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MusicBusinessService

    public interface MusicBusinessInterface<T,S>
    Interface class for any business service that will handle products. Every product SpringBean must contain CRUD methods at a minimum

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addAlbum(T album)
      Method to add an album to the database
      boolean addSong(S song)
      Method to add a song to the database of products
      int editAlbumInfo(T album)
      A function that allows albums to be edited
      int editTrackInfo(S song)
      A function that allows songs to be edited
      T findAlbumByID(int id)
      Method to find a single album using that product's ID
      java.util.List<T> findAllAlbumsByUser(int id)
      Returns a list of albums from the database with a certain ID, whether that is the product's primary key or a foreign key.
      int removeAlbum(T album)
      This function removes an album from the database
      int removeTrack(S song)
      This function removes a song from the database

    • Method Detail

      • addAlbum

        boolean addAlbum(T album)
          throws ItemAlreadyExistsException
        Method to add an album to the database
        Parameters:
        album - The album to be added
        Returns:
        boolean Whether or not the album was successfully added
        Throws:
        ItemAlreadyExistsException - This exception is thrown in the event that the supplied album already exists in the database, and duplicates are not allowed

      • addSong

        boolean addSong(S song)
         throws ItemAlreadyExistsException,
                ItemNotFoundException
        Method to add a song to the database of products
        Parameters:
        song - The song to be added
        Returns:
        boolean Whether or not the song was successfully added
        Throws:
        ItemAlreadyExistsException - This exception is thrown in the event that the supplied song already exists in the database, and duplicates are not allowed
        ItemNotFoundException - This exception is thrown in the event that a necessary item is not found

      • findAlbumByID

        T findAlbumByID(int id)
         throws ItemNotFoundException
        Method to find a single album using that product's ID
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the album being searched for
        Returns:
        SongModel The album found. A -1 will be returned for ID in the event that nothing is found
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - This exception is thrown in the event that no item matching the parameters is found in the database

      • findAllAlbumsByUser

        java.util.List<T> findAllAlbumsByUser(int id)
                               throws ItemNotFoundException
        Returns a list of albums from the database with a certain ID, whether that is the product's primary key or a foreign key.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to search by
        Returns:
        List The list of all results with the searched ID.
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - This exception is thrown in the event that no item is found in the database
